title: Hundreds flee Gurugram slum cluster after threats to vacate area
selftext: >> A mob of members of some right-wing outfits assaulted the slum dwellers in Palra village and told them to ‘go back where you came from’; a resident says 90% of Muslim families from the cluster have left since August 1
